conclusion: Determine where the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles by tracking the path of each liquid stream.
Starting points are A (blue), B (yellow), and C (pink).
Blue liquid from A flows down, merging with yellow liquid on the black slant.
Blue liquid continues down with yellow liquid, merging into the yellow container.
Yellow liquid from B flows down, crossing over the black slant.
Yellow liquid merges with blue liquid and flows into the yellow container.
Pink liquid from C flows straight down, passing the grey slant.
Pink liquid moves into the grey container.
Blue and yellow liquids merge and flow into container E.
Pink liquid flows into container D.
Container D will collect pink liquid.
Container E will collect a mixture of blue and yellow liquids.
